idea-plugin.name: Code Screenshots
idea-plugin.description:
Code Screenshots

A simple and powerful IDEA plugin forked from amaembo/screenshoter, designed to help you capture sharp, high-quality code screenshots directly from your editor.

To use, simply select a block of code and press Ctrl+Alt+Shift+A (or Option+Shift+Command+A on macOS).
